body:
Anyone know which control they used on this site to get the Organisation chart? [http://www.yworks.com/products/yfilessilverlight/SilverChart.html](http://www.yworks.com/products/yfilessilverlight/SilverChart.html)
Or any other controls that are similiar?

If not, could you suggest a way on how to get started building one? (Interface-wise, I think I know how to get the data binding to work).
title: Silverlight Organisation chart control
